data.text:
This was the best trip I’ve been on.
Very warm, welcoming and funny Staff that made me feel safe and welcome. 
A big shout out to Mahmoud who went above and beyond to make my stay the best especially when I was poorly.
I couldn’t have asked for a better trip.
data.title: Staff and Hotel in General

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
 Thank you for choosing IL Mercato Hotel & Spa for your holiday. On behalf of our entire team, we would like to thank you for your nice review. All of your kind comments will be passed to our team as they work extremely hard to ensure our guests have a wonderful time in our hotel. 
We look forward of welcoming you in nearest future in our own tradition of warm and friendly hospitality.
Kind Regards,
Mohamed Abd Gelil
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Abd Gelil  Mohamed

data.text:
We had two lovely weeks at this hotel. There are four pools, two of which are on the roof. One for activities and the other adult only, which we used for relaxing.
We did a few excursions with mido which were very good and reasonably priced.
We had several massages and I would higly recvomend Jasmine.
Anna was very attentive and was always making sure everything was ok so thankyou Anna.
The food was good and the restaurant staff always very helpful with a smile on their face.
There was entertainment on the roof nightly which was good, the animation team did a good job too.
The reception staff always helpful.
We used the hotel taxi service instead of the ones outside as we felt it was safer. Abdo gave an excellent service and nothing was too much trouble.
Our housekeeper kept our room clean and tidy, leaving various animal shapes with the towels. He made sure we had everything we needed.
What really made our holiday were Mahmoud on the reception bar, Atef on the roof bar and Mustafa on the beach bar and roof bar. They are all so nice and friendly and made sure we had all we needed. 
I got bitten badly by mosquitoes and they gave me ice in bags to relieve the itching.
We had good laughs and banter with them and will miss these lads lots.
We hope to  come back soon
Thankyou for a lovely stay.
data.title: Stay at il mercato

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Jane,
Thank you for choosing IL Mercato Hotel & Spa for your holiday.
We are grateful that you took a moment from your valuable time to post your excellent review. 
It was a delight to read that you have enjoyed your stay at IL Mercato Hotel & Spa, which is the main aim of the team-to make sure that guests are satisfied and leave our hotel with good impression and great memories.
We will extend your appreciation to all members of staff, taking care to give a special thanks to those you have named personally. 
Thank you very much for your review and we look forward to the pleasure of hosting you at in the near future with our own tradition of warm and friendly hospitality.
Kind Regards,
Mohamed Abd Gelil
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Abd Gelil  Mohamed

data.text: The hotel was absolutely amazing!!! No improvements needed I loved everything about it genuinely the best trip ever!! I loved it and it was the best time, I had multiple massages and went out to ride camel, scuba diving, parasailing and glass bottom boat
data.title: We did a lot of excursions with midoo and used the facilities at the hotel, mo was so funny and absolutely amazing too!!

data.text:
i would like to thank all hotel staff about my holiday specially mahmoud saied 
mostafa 
attef, we have an amazing holiday food is great, room is perfect size and view, and and animation team was very nice , different show every night, and always activity in the pool , in the morning, and i would like to thank all manger as always On my way! ask to make sure everything is ok, for sure we will be back soon ,and i recommend this hotel to everyone. couples and family too thanks everyone agin ❤️
data.title: one of my best holiday

data.text: The hotel staff were very friendly and caring, especially the room attendant Ramadan who always made sure that everything was fine with you.The evening entertainment was great fun too. Everything you needed was there. Would definitely think about going back
data.title: Special hotel and staff
